description: Durability/DLQ configuration extends the base RabbitMQ service.
mitigation_plan: Task assigned to the same developer sequentially.

description: PHI redaction enricher requires the base Serilog setup.
mitigation_plan: Assign to developer with security focus.
impact_if_delayed: Delays HIPAA compliance verification for logging.

description: Audit trail logic must be integrated into the user creation transaction.
mitigation_plan: Use a single DbContext transaction; verify with integration test.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks UI development for user creation.

description: Login ViewModel requires the AuthenticationService to perform login operations.
mitigation_plan: Backend developer provides the service interface early for frontend to mock against.
impact_if_delayed: Delays completion of the login feature.

description: The inactivity timer service consumes events from the low-level input monitor.
mitigation_plan: Tackle TASK-029 early in the sprint due to its high technical risk.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire session lock feature.

description: E2E test for user creation can only be written and executed after the UI is complete.
mitigation_plan: Frontend developer to add stable automation IDs to all UI controls as they are created.
impact_if_delayed: Reduces confidence in the stability of the feature.
